name: CustomMaterial.Opacity
desc: An object that defines the transparency options for a custom material.

items.name: init(floatLiteral: Float)
items.desc: Creates an opacity object from a single value.

items.name: init(scale: Float, texture: CustomMaterial.Texture?)
items.desc: Creates an object that defines the opacity of an entity using a single value, a UV-mapped image texture, or both.

items.name: init(PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Opacity)
items.desc: Creates an object from the opacity property of an existing physically based material.

items.name: var scale: Float
items.desc: The amount of opacity specified as a single value.

items.name: var texture: CustomMaterial.Texture?
items.desc: The amount of opacity specified using a UV-mapped image.

items.name: typealias CustomMaterial.Opacity.FloatLiteralType
items.desc: The type used to represent opacity.
